links.*: A Description of the Island of Númenor

wikitext.*:
[[File:Ted Nasmith - White Ships from Valinor.jpg|250px|thumb|''White Ships from Valinor'' by [[Ted Nasmith]]]]
The northernmost of the three bays that ran along the western coasts of the [[Andustar]] in [[Númenor]]. The greatest of the three, its shores were no more than a narrow shelf of land from which steep cliffs rose up. Beneath these cliffs at its eastern end was the famous haven of [[Andúnië]].<ref>{{UT|3}}, p. 167</ref> There are suggestions that there may have been a second haven on this bay, too, named [[Almaida]].<ref>{{UT|Intro}}, p. 7</ref>
